Girl
1.content: Are you a boy or a girl?
1.title: Getting started

choices: A large, metallic area with enormous objects (Inside someone's locker)
On a strange landscape with a soft ground (On one of the characters' body part)
A field of tall, odd, green trees (In the middle of school's courtyard)
In a dark tunnel with a strong odor (Inside someone's shoe)
Other choices
11.content:
You were in your house that late at night, watching TV. You pretty have nothing else to do at this time, but just relax at the moment. At the TV, there was a news about a strange crisis happening around the world; about people getting sucked into many, mysterious portals that were popping up everywhere. You however, didn't see and heard very well as you were slowly about to fall asleep. Finally you dozed off, completely unaware of one of these many portal that was now opening up from below you and immediately sucked you in!

Where did the portal lead you?
11.title: Boy

choices: It is a giant shoe/boot resting on its side (Someone is resting on the grass)
It was a giant ball (You in the middle of a game)
It was a giant bag (Someone left it there)
113.content:
After that long trip across the portal, you slowly got up from the ground and try to get your bearings. You opened your eyes and saw the strange world that you're on right now. Everything around you is covered by tall, odd, green trees. You don't know where are you exactly but you know that you are not in your home world anymore.

As you wander around for a bit, you began to wonder about your current location. Suddenly, your eyes have landed on to something huge. Curious, you decided to get a closer look at the giant object.
113.title: A field of tall, odd, green trees (In the middl...

choices: Use Your Head
"Foot" Ball
The Shorts End of the Stick
1132.content:
It was a giant soccer ball.

Seeing that it was tallest thing around, you began to climb the grooves, wedging yourself between the panels and half-crawling, half-climbing your way up. You had made it just past the "equator" when a shadow fell across the ball, and it was lifted up into the air. A voice shouted, "FOUND IT!", and suddenly you and the ball were flung out into the field, where a bunch of giant athletes converged on the ball. You in a soccer ball during a soccer match!

The next stretch of time (it was hard to tell with the constant, nauseating motion) was literally a blur. You could hardly make out any faces, except for one -- a giant girl with apparently blue skin and rainbow-colored hair. She moved like lightning, and kicked the ball as hard as she could every time. Due to this constant hammering, your death-grip on the sides of the panels that kept you from flying off loosened as you grew exhausted. Finally, the ball came to a slow stop somewhere in the field. Panting, you waited for the final blow. And suddenly, who else but that rainbow-haired soccer player came into view?

She stood over the ball like a colossus, one foot on either side, utterly unaware of your presence. Still, you couldn't help but feel as if she was subtly gloating over you... Then came the kick. But instead of sailing off into the green field, she began to show off, bouncing the ball off her knee, heel, and head. You were bumped and jostled around before the last, sharp strike that sent the ball up and away while leaving you on her person. But how did she send off the soccer ball? And where were you?

1. She used her head -- you are now between her mouth and her nose

2. She used her foot -- you have fallen (unfortunately) into her shoe

3. She used her heel -- you are stuck between her skirt and the back of her biker shorts
1132.title: It was a giant ball (You in the middle of a game)

choices: In a waiting tissue
On someone's clothing
11321.content:
The ball sailed up in the air, coming down on her head. She hit it with enough force that your fatigued limbs could no longer keep you with the orb, and you pitched out of the groove and onto the iridescent soccer player's face. You landed just under her left nostril, and were about to yell for her attention, when her nose flared and she inhaled deeply. Due to the lack of handholds on her skin, you were vacuumed up into her nasal cavity and almost sucked further back down her throat and into her lungs. But your ride came to a quick stop as you hit a sticky pile of mucus.

You struggled to get out, but your thrashing against the walls of the vast cavern only mildly irritated your unaware host's body, causing it to exude more mucus, which piled on you and nearly engulfed you. While your head was free, the rest of your body from the neck down was encased in the giantess's slowly solidifying snot. You were stuck. All you could do was yell and rock your prison, and she was too big to hear your pleas.

She was not too large to feel you rolling around in her nose, however.

There was a rumbling.

"AH...AHH...AHHH...AHHH H..."

Then came the explosion. The small pinpricks to the outside world that were her nostrils grew larger, and you were flung out into the blinding light in a rush of air and snot...

Where did you land?
11321.title: Use Your Head

choices: On a hard surface, far above the ground (on a seat at a desk)
In a dark area filled with giant objects (inside someone's bookbag)
Somewhere else
115.title: Other choices

choices: Applejack
Sunset Shimmer
Pinkie Pie
1151.content:
You woke up on a hard surface, far above the ground. You appeared to be in a massive chair, at a gargantuan desk, in a mammoth classroom! You looked over the edge of the chair at the sheer drop below. There was no way you could make it down. Then you heard a loud series of thuds, each one getting closer and closer. A giant female appeared. At least, they appeared female, and humanoid -- they were wearing something like blue jeans, after all. But they had skin and hair colors that no normal person would have. And they were busy snipping away at something. Clear strips fluttered down. Tape.

The mysterious giantess walked over to the seat you were in. You tried yelling up at them, but they either didn't know your language, or they were too engrossed in their project. Another snip. Another piece of tape came floating down on top of you. You tried to escape, but the tape just spun in the air and landed on you, sticky side down. You were stuck to the chair, and could only watch as the giantess set down the project on the desk, turned their body around, and began to sit. You realized that you were about to end up beneath the right butt cheek of this giantess.

Who were they?
1151.title: On a hard surface, far above the ground (on a s...

choices: In a pile of fabrics (stuck in a closet)
In a drawer with massive objects (makeup drawer)
Somewhere else
1153.title: Somewhere else

choices: You try to get down to the floor
You suddenly heard a door open (Someone is coming in)
11531.content:
*yawn* You awoke from your "peaceful" nap and opened your eyes to see...nothing but darkness. "Since when did my house got so dark?" you thought as you found another odd thing in your "living room": the whole place was too cramped and soft as well. 'Something tells me that I'm not in my house anymore..." you said as you try to see through the dark. Suddenly, you see a ray of light coming from above and you decided that it was the exit to this bizarre place. You climbed all the way up to the hole by grabbing on to the soft walls; maybe this hole will explain where you are.

It took you about several seconds to get to the top and after you got there, you looked around the new world you are in. "Oh...my...god!!" you said just as you laid eyes on your brand-new surroundings. Everywhere you look, you see many kinds of enormous types of clothing. You looked below and see that you were inside a giant pocket this whole time. You soon realized that you were no longer in your home, you were inside a giant closet. You look all the way down to the floor to see that it was very far down. "Can I even get down from here without getting hurt?" you asked yourself.
11531.title: The land of giant clothes

choices: ...the back pocket of a pair of pants
...the pocket of a shirt/skirt
115312.content: You heard a door creak, and your first instinct was to hide in a pocket. You dove back into the pocket you were in, burrowing as far down as you could. Little did you know that the person opening the closet not only was the owner, but was selecting their clothes for the day! The pocket suddenly turned vertical, and though you could not see who had you on yet, you realized you were in...
115312.title: You suddenly heard a door open (Someone is comi...

choices: To sit down at a chair
The person is talking to another person
1153121.content:
You felt the whole pants quickly lifted off from the floor as you fell down on the pocket ground due to the g-forces. After that's over, you stood up and found out that your entire shelter is now very tight; you realized that you were in the back pocket of this person's pants as the "wall" behind you was soft and cushiony. You still don't know who is this giant is but is safe to assure that you need to stay in this pocket as you felt the giant beginning to walk. During this, the "wall" starts to push you against the pocket wall with each step they take. You don't like this at all but you know can't escape not just because you were stuck there but because that you don't want to end up in the middle of nowhere.

Several minutes have passed and you were soaked in sweat from being pressed over and over again from this person's behind. Thankfully, they finally stopped walking and you breathe in relief. "Thank god.." you said but why did this giant stopped?
1153121.title: ...the back pocket of a pair of pants

choices: Yes, you escaped and are free at last
No, you blacked out from how tight your current position is
11531211.content:
Once again, you felt the fleshy 'wall' presses down on you but this time even more harder. You felt yourself falling downwards and wondered what's going on. Before you can think about it, you sense something coming in your way down and.....SLAM! You ended up getting sandwiched between this giant's rear end and a hard surface; this giant just sat down. You wanted to scream but you couldn't; you were competently stuck!

With all your strength, you try to crawl all the way to the exit and hop that you can escape this nightmare. Even though you were pasted to the chair, you can (very slightly) move across this tight space. Can you make it?
11531211.title: To sit down at a chair

info.brief_description: Based on an old, cancelled, campfire story
info.description:
Many people from all over the world have ended up in a strange world after each of them come across a strange portal that seemed to pop up in many places. But this world nothing like they ever seen before, it was a gargantuan world filled with almost anything several times their sizes even the smallest thing like a paperclip would tower over them. But that was the least of their worries, this unusual was filled with enormous creatures that were surprisingly human like them. They were enough to over shadow every buildings and structures in their world, they were also pretty odd as they shown to have strange features most particular their odd multicolored skins.

Little do these people know, they actually ended up in the gigantic version of Canterlot high from MLP Equestria girls. Everyone were all hanging around, talking to one another, playing some games or other activites, and all minding their own business, unaware of the nearly-micro outsiders amongst them.

1. Any character of MLP are allowed, but it has to be from the Equestria Girls series If it's someone from the main series, then they must be humanized exactly from the films.

2. Other fetishes allowed in this story as long if it's still remains with the main theme of the story which is the Marco/Micro content.

3. This is an unaware story but interaction are still allowed

4. Try to use decent grammer

5. Keep the personalities and characteristics of the MLP characters the way they are, unless there's a reason behind the changes

6. To keep this a little original, the characters have no knowledge of the MLP characters and settings

7. Your character can have of variety of personalities.

8. Don't end the story way too soon.

9. Deaths are allowed but please make them detailed.

10. Have fun!!!!





06/21/2019 UPDATE:

As of this time, the story's rating has now jumped from 13+ to 18+ giving everyone the freedom to write whatever fits their style whatever they want. Any chapters with violent, sexual or other contents that are common in older rated stories are accepted without consequences.

However, there's still a few limits that you must follow. Just because you can write whatever you want does not mean there's no rules.

New Rules:

1. No extreme sexual content with underage characters.

It's so damn obvious why stuff like this should never be in the story. I don't want to see a story involving NSFW material with young characters because it's seriously messed up. So please don't go too far with this sort of stuff with the chapter involve around them.

2. No rebirthing.

I can still tolerate Insertion stuff....even if that's not my cup of tea. However, I can't really make sense with rebirthing stuff (I mean how can't you be turn into a newborn just by going inside reproductive organs) so I'm afraid this sort of stuff aren't allowed. My apologizes to all you fans out there.

3. Toilet stuff

While I'm fine with some bodily functions like sweat, boogers, and so on. However, I'm not okay with pooping, peeing and other stuff that is commonly seen on the toilet. Seriously, I'm terribly grossed out by this sort of stuff. Of course, that doesn't mean everyone can't do their business as long it happens off-screen.


So there you have it guys, go extra nuts and write what's ever in your mind ;)
